note: Praise kink, comfort sex, quickie, sleepy sex, make-up sex, emotional dimensions

scenes.generation_prompt: intimate moment during sex, man looking into woman's eyes telling her she's good girl, his hand on her face tenderly, she melting at his words, praise visible in his expression, her response to being praised, emotional connection through affirmation, bedroom soft lighting

user_description.en: Good girl. The words make her melt. Praise as foreplay, as reward, as connection. His approval setting her on fire.
user_description.ru: Хорошая девочка. Слова заставляют её таять. Похвала как прелюдия, как награда, как связь. Его одобрение зажигает её.

ai_context.description: Praise kink - receiving praise during sex. 'Good girl' and similar affirmations. Tests response to verbal approval.

question_angles.as_receiver: Does being called 'good girl' during sex turn you on?
question_angles.emotional: Does praise enhance sex for you?
question_angles.specific: What praise words work for you?

taboo_context.normalization: Praise kink is extremely common—positive reinforcement is arousing for many

scenes.generation_prompt: woman riding man, she leaning down whispering what a good boy he is, praising how well he pleases her, he responding to her words with visible arousal, her hand on his face affectionate, praise during female-led sex

user_description.en: Good boy. Such a good boy for me. Her praise making him harder. Male praise kink, her words of approval his reward.
user_description.ru: Хороший мальчик. Такой хороший мальчик для меня. Её похвала делает его твёрже. Мужской прейз-кинк, её слова одобрения его награда.

ai_context.description: Male praise kink - man receiving praise during sex. 'Good boy' and similar. Tests male response to female verbal approval.

question_angles.as_receiver: Men: Does being called 'good boy' turn you on?
question_angles.as_giver: Women: Do you praise your male partners?
question_angles.dynamic: How does male praise kink feel?

taboo_context.normalization: Men can have praise kink too—wanting partner approval is human

scenes.generation_prompt: couple in hallway or kitchen, clothes barely removed just pushed aside, urgent quick penetration, she against wall or counter, him pressing into her, no time for foreplay just need each other now, rushed passionate, daytime

user_description.en: No time, but need you now. Clothes pushed aside, not removed. Fast, urgent, against the wall. A quickie before the world intrudes.
user_description.ru: Нет времени, но нужен тебя сейчас. Одежда сдвинута, не снята. Быстро, срочно, у стены. Перепихон до того как мир вмешается.

ai_context.description: Quickie - fast urgent sex without full undressing. Tests: spontaneity, urgency, convenience sex.

question_angles.frequency: How often do you want quick spontaneous sex?

taboo_context.normalization: Quickies are valid—sometimes urgency IS the turn on

scenes.generation_prompt: early morning bedroom, she half-asleep being spooned, he gently entering her from behind, slow lazy movements, both still drowsy, intimate morning sex, soft light through curtains, gentle pace neither fully awake

user_description.en: Half-asleep, feeling him slide inside. Slow, lazy morning movements. Neither fully awake, just pleasure in the haze.
user_description.ru: Полусонная, чувствует как он входит. Медленные, ленивые утренние движения. Никто не полностью проснулся, только удовольствие в дымке.

ai_context.description: Sleepy/morning sex - sex while half-asleep or just waking. Tests: morning intimacy, lazy sex, vulnerability.

question_angles.preference: Do you enjoy sex while half-asleep?
question_angles.initiation: Is waking up to sex appealing?
question_angles.consent: Do you have standing consent for this with partner?

taboo_context.normalization: Sleepy sex requires prior discussion and standing consent between partners

scenes.generation_prompt: bedroom morning, he waking up to her mouth on him, she under sheets giving morning blowjob, his face showing surprise then pleasure, waking to oral, her gift to him, soft morning light

user_description.en: Waking up to her mouth already on him. Consciousness returning to waves of pleasure. Morning gift of oral.
user_description.ru: Просыпается к её рту уже на нём. Сознание возвращается к волнам удовольствия. Утренний подарок оральным.

ai_context.description: Woken with oral - waking partner by giving oral. Tests: morning surprise, oral gift, vulnerability.

question_angles.as_receiver: Would you love being woken with oral?
question_angles.as_giver: Would you wake your partner with oral?

taboo_context.normalization: Wake-up oral is popular fantasy—requires prior discussion

scenes.generation_prompt: couple in bedroom after argument, tension turning to passion, she pulling him into kiss mid-argument, clothes coming off urgently, anger transforming to desire, intense makeup sex beginning, emotional intensity visible

user_description.en: The argument stops mid-sentence. Suddenly kissing, then more. Anger channeled into passion. Make-up sex—intense because of what preceded it.
user_description.ru: Спор останавливается на полуслове. Внезапно поцелуи, потом больше. Злость направлена в страсть. Секс примирения—интенсивный из-за того что было до.

ai_context.description: Make-up sex after argument. Emotional tension to physical release. Tests: anger-to-passion, emotional sex.

question_angles.pattern: Do arguments sometimes lead to sex?
question_angles.emotional: Is the intensity worth the conflict?

taboo_context.normalization: Make-up sex can be intense—shouldn't replace actual conflict resolution

scenes.generation_prompt: bedroom, she's been crying, he holding her, comfort turning to gentle intimacy, slow tender sex as comfort, emotional connection, her tears dried, his gentleness, healing through physical connection

user_description.en: She was crying. Now he holds her, comfort becoming intimacy. Slow, tender. Sex as healing, as being held through pain.
user_description.ru: Она плакала. Теперь он держит её, утешение становится близостью. Медленно, нежно. Секс как исцеление, как быть обнятой сквозь боль.

ai_context.description: Comfort sex - sex as emotional comfort after distress. Tests: emotional sex, tenderness, healing intimacy.

question_angles.experience: Does sex help you feel better when upset?
question_angles.giving: Would you offer intimacy as comfort?
question_angles.boundaries: Is sex during emotional times okay?

taboo_context.normalization: Comfort sex is valid—physical closeness releases oxytocin and helps bonding

scenes.generation_prompt: doorway scene, couple reuniting after time apart, luggage visible, they can't make it past the entrance, kissing urgently, clothes coming off at the door, reunion passion, desperate need after separation

user_description.en: He's barely through the door before she's on him. Days or weeks apart and now finally together. Can't even make it to the bedroom.
user_description.ru: Он едва переступил порог когда она на нём. Дни или недели врозь и теперь наконец вместе. Даже до спальни не дойти.

ai_context.description: Reunion sex after separation. Tests: anticipation payoff, urgency, longing fulfilled.

taboo_context.normalization: Reunion sex is heightened by anticipation—natural and common

scenes.generation_prompt: elegant setting, he serving her in butler-like fashion, bringing her drink, kneeling to remove her shoes, massage after, service as devotion, she receiving with grace, his pleasure in serving, domestic service submission

user_description.en: He serves her—bringing drinks, removing her shoes, massaging her feet. His pleasure comes from her comfort. Service as submission.
user_description.ru: Он служит ей—приносит напитки, снимает её туфли, массирует ноги. Его удовольствие от её комфорта. Служение как подчинение.

ai_context.description: Service submission - finding pleasure in serving partner. Non-sexual service as BDSM dynamic.

question_angles.as_server: Do you find pleasure in serving your partner?

taboo_context.normalization: Service submission is valid kink—joy in partner's comfort

user_description.en: He kisses every inch of her. Her shoulder, her hip, her stomach—worshipping her whole body, not just the obvious places.

ai_context.description: Body worship - devotional attention to partner's whole body. Not just genitals or specific fetish areas.

question_angles.as_worshipper: Do you enjoy worshipping your partner's body?
